description: A hardy plant that purifies indoor air and thrives in low light.
careTips: Water every 2-3 weeks, allowing soil to dry completely between waterings. Prefers indirect or low light. Fertilize lightly once every 2-3 months during growing season.

description: A resilient plant that adapts well to various light conditions and improves air quality.
careTips: Keep soil slightly moist, water once a week. Prefers bright, indirect sunlight. Feed with a balanced liquid fertilizer monthly in spring and summer.

description: Known for its elegant white flowers and ability to purify air naturally.
careTips: Water once the top inch of soil is dry, usually once a week. Prefers low to medium indirect light. Use a balanced fertilizer every 6 weeks during the growing season.

description: A versatile vine plant that thrives in indirect light and is great for hanging baskets.
careTips: Water every 1-2 weeks, allowing soil to dry out between waterings. Prefers bright, indirect light but tolerates low light. Feed monthly with diluted houseplant fertilizer.

description: A stylish plant that tolerates low light and irregular watering.
careTips: Water every 2-3 weeks or when soil is completely dry. Thrives in low to medium light. Fertilize lightly once every 2-3 months with general-purpose plant food.

description: A bold plant with large, glossy leaves that purify indoor air.
careTips: Water weekly, keeping soil slightly moist but not soggy. Prefers bright, indirect sunlight. Fertilize once a month during spring and summer with balanced plant food.
